public class TimeIncDecProxy implements IncDec {

    private IncDec delegate;

    public TimeIncDecProxy(IncDec delegate) {
        this.delegate = delegate;
    }

    @Override
    public void increment() {
        long start = System.currentTimeMillis();
        delegate.increment();
        long spent = System.currentTimeMillis() - start;
        System.out.println("time spent at increment " + spent);
    }

    @Override
    public void decrement() {
        long start = System.currentTimeMillis();
        delegate.decrement();
        long spent = System.currentTimeMillis() - start;
        System.out.println("time spent at decrement " + spent);
    }

    public static void main(String... args) throws Exception {
        IncDec in = new TimeIncDecProxy(new MyIncDec(10));
        in.increment();
        in.decrement();
    }

}
